---
title: "disjoint"
---

    disjoint(geom1, geom2)

### Parameters
* `geom1`: the geometry. This can either be a GDAL AbstractGeometry or a {{< gmtref GMTdataset type=gmttype >}} (or vector of it), or a Matrix
* `geom2`: Second geometry. AbstractGeometry if `geom1::AbstractGeometry` or a GMTdataset/Matrix if `geom1` is GMT type 

Returns `true` if the geometries are disjoint.

```{julia}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis
using GMT
GMT.doc_source_links("disjoint")
```
